subject: Gymnastics
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The investigation into the eligibility of the Chinese women’s team in Beijing has been expanded to include members of the 2000 squad, which won the bronze medal in Sydney. International gymnastics officials are examining whether Yang Yun and Dong Fangxiao, in particular, were old enough to compete. The investigation is continuing a month after the Beijing Games ended, and there is no timetable for when it will be finished.
